name: Murders at Tealwoods Manor
description:
You've been invited to a strange party at Lady Tealwoods' new mansion. The other members of the guestlist are strange and often quarrelsome, and you are all locked in until midnight. A sudden murder is revealed, and you must piece together who is lying, and who is the murderer as you uncover the secrets of the different strange guests of Tealwoods Manor.



13 playable characters with unique dialogue.
A murderer randomly selected from the attendee's, unique every game.
The murderer will cleverly lie to you, and frantic guests will claim they saw anything, up to you to figure out what the truth is.
Up to 20 million unique combinations of dialogue and scenarios built into the game's randomization engine.
wager on which guests will survive the night in an attempt to score the most points.
